CustomField.description: Specifies the type of event this is for use on the inventory tracker.
CustomField.formula: IF(Name = "EE - California Public Sector CIO Academy 2024","Live", IF(Name = "CDG - Chief Data Officer Summit 2024","Exclude", IF(Name = "CDE - Higher Education CIO Leadership Council Meeting and Dinner 2024","Exclude", IF(CONTAINS(Name, "Briefing"), "Exclude", CASE(Event_Type__c, "Virtual Summit", "Virtual", "Standard_Invitation only", "Live", "Standard_Invitation only w/ Hub", "Live", "Standard_Public Sector only w/ Hub", "Live", "Standard_Private and Public Sector", "Live", "Standard_Public Sector only", "Live", "")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the type of event this is for use on the inventory tracker.
CustomField.label: Inventory Event Type
